reviews.review_msg: People have to get over that she's from NY. She's a little abrasive its true. But she's also super nice and helpful if you visit her for office hours. And she is really smart, and as a woman I find her encouraging to me in my philosophical pursuits. Just don't talk for the sake of talking, ask intelligent questions, and you'll keep your hide intact
Brilliant sense of humour. Brilliant, period. Kind. Great teacher.
